sentence: the progress i'm talking about is reflected in four interrelated trends that i would like to briefly review: (1) the maturation of the concept of community development; (2) the evolution of public policy and programs; (3) the growth in number, diversity and sophistication of participants; and most importantly, (4) the development of a powerful set of diverse partnerships at the local and state level.
